prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What is the true intended outcome of my connection with Stefan?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below are the data points from the horary chart that apply directly under horary principles to your query (“What is the true intended outcome of my connection with Stefan?”). Recall that in horary practice you represent yourself with the Ascendant and Stefan by its 9th house (the house of foreign or unexpected matters):

1. Core House and Representation Data
 • Querent (Melissa Gale): Ascendant in Gemini at 2° Gemini (House 1)
 • Stefan: Represented by the Ascendant’s 9th house (starting at 19° Capricorn), which contains Pluto (at 2° Aquarius as per planetary position)

2. Planetary Positions (with their zodiac degree and indicated house placement when available):
 • Sun: 27° 14′ Aquarius (located in the 10th house starting at 8° Aquarius)
 • Moon: 2° 23′ Libra (by house data, it falls in the 5th house starting at 3° Virgo)
 • Mercury: 2° 10′ Pisces
 • Venus: 7° 4′ Aries
 • Mars: 17° 27′ Cancer (retrograde)
 • Jupiter: 11° 29′ Gemini (in the 1st house with the Ascendant)
 • Saturn: 19° 5′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23° 22′ Taurus (in the 12th house starting at 17° Aries)
 • Neptune: 28° 25′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2° 30′ Aquarius (located in the 9th house)
 • North Node: 29° 4′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Chiron: 20° 1′ Aries

3. Major Aspects (each with orb noted and subject to horary scrutiny):
 • Mercury square Ascendant (orb 0°)
 • Pluto trine Ascendant (orb 0°)
 • Moon trine Ascendant (orb 0°)
 • Moon trine Pluto (orb 0°)
 • Venus sextile Midheaven (MC) (orb 1°)
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb 1°)
 • Venus trine IC (orb 1°)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb 2°)
 • North Node sextile Ascendant (orb 3°)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (orb 3°)
 • Jupiter sextile IC (orb 3°)
 • Mars square Chiron (orb 3°)
 • Moon opposition North Node (orb 3°)
 • Jupiter trine MC (orb 3°)
 • Neptune sextile Ascendant (orb 4°)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb 4°)
 • Venus sextile Jupiter (orb 4°)
 • Sun square Uranus (orb 4°)
 • Moon opposition Neptune (orb 4°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb 5°)
 • Venus sextile Ascendant (orb 5°)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb 5°)
 • Sun square Ascendant (orb 5°)
 • Moon opposition Venus (orb 5°)
 • Sun conjunct Mercury (orb 5°)
 • Ascendant sextile IC (orb 6°)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb 6°)
 • Moon sextile IC (orb 6°)
 • Pluto opposition IC (orb 6°)
 • Pluto conjunct MC (orb 6°)
 • Ascendant trine MC (orb 6°)
 • Moon trine MC (orb 6°)

4. Patterns and Configurations Identified in the Chart:
 • Grand Trine: Involving Moon (2° Libra), MC (8° Aquarius), Ascendant (2° Gemini) and Pluto (2° Aquarius)
 • Castle Patterns:
  – One castle with Moon (2° Libra), MC (8° Aquarius), Ascendant (2° Gemini), Pluto (2° Aquarius), IC (8° Leo) and North Node (29° Pisces)
  – A second castle pattern with Moon (2° Libra), MC (8° Aquarius), Ascendant (2° Gemini), Pluto (2° Aquarius) and Venus (7° Aries)
 • Multiple Planet Opposition: Involving Moon (2° Libra), North Node (29° Pisces), Neptune (28° Pisces) and Venus (7° Aries)
 • Rectangles: Two separate rectangles involving (1) Moon, IC, MC, Venus and Pluto; (2) Moon, IC, Pluto and North Node
 • Cradle Patterns: Several occurrences, including combinations with Moon, North Node, Ascendant, IC, Neptune, Venus and Jupiter

5. Special Features and Additional Notes:
 • The Moon was a waning gibbous
 • There is an Air element dominance among the inner planets
 • None of the inner planets fall in an Earth sign
 • The three modes (Cardinal, Mutable, Fixed) are evenly distributed among the inner planets
 • Most of the planets are located in the top left quadrant of the chart
 • Uranus is rising
 • Pluto is positioned on the Midheaven while the IC sits on the Nadir
 • The Cradle pattern appears most frequently (six times)
 • Sextile aspects are the most common (thirteen occurrences)
 • The Ascendant is involved in twelve aspects
 • Neptune in Pisces is in the sign of its rulership

These are the data elements selected for further methodical interpretation of your query, employing strict horary principles.

4. Patterns and Configurations Identified in the Chart:
 • Grand Trine: Involving Moon (2° Libra), MC (8° Aquarius), Ascendant (2° Gemini) and Pluto (2° Aquarius)
 • Castle Patterns:
  – One castle with Moon (2° Libra), MC (8° Aquarius), Ascendant (2° Gemini), Pluto (2° Aquarius), IC (8° Leo) and North Node (29° Pisces)
  – A second castle pattern with Moon (2° Libra), MC (8° Aquarius), Ascendant (2° Gemini), Pluto (2° Aquarius) and Venus (7° Aries)

 • There is an Air element dominance among the inner planets

 • Most of the planets are located in the top left quadrant of the chart
 • Uranus is rising
 • Pluto is positioned on the Midheaven while the IC sits on the Nadir
 • The Cradle pattern appears most frequently (six times)
 • Sextile aspects are the most common (thirteen occurrences)

 • Neptune in Pisces is in the sign of its rulership

These are the data elements selected for further methodical interpretation of your query, employing strict horary principles.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda's eyes narrow as she studies the intricate patterns before her, her jeweled fingers tracing the aspects with practiced precision

My dear, this chart speaks volumes about the nature and trajectory of your connection with Stefan. The positioning is quite, revealing.

First, let's examine the core dynamics. Your Ascendant in Gemini shows you approaching this situation with natural curiosity and perhaps some duality in your feelings. Meanwhile, Stefan, represented by your 9th house containing Pluto in Aquarius, suggests a profound transformative influence that comes from abroad.

Her rings catch the candlelight as she points to specific aspects

The exact trine between Pluto and your Ascendant (0° orb) is particularly telling. This indicates an intensely magnetic connection that has the power to transform both parties involved. It's not just a casual attraction - there's something deeply karmic here.

The Moon in Libra forming exact trines to both your Ascendant and Pluto creates a Grand Trine pattern. This suggests that your emotional needs (Moon) align harmoniously with both your approach (Ascendant) and the transformative nature of your connection with Stefan (Pluto).

She pauses, her expression growing more serious

However, I must note the Multiple Planet Opposition pattern involving the Moon opposing Venus, Neptune, and the North Node. This suggests internal conflict between your emotional needs (Moon) and your desires (Venus), as well as some potential illusion or idealization (Neptune).

The presence of Mars retrograde in Cancer in your 2nd house, squaring Chiron, hints at some repressed desires and old wounds around self-worth that this connection is stirring up.

Her voice drops to a more intimate tone

The Venus sextile to Pluto suggests a powerful sexual attraction, while its placement in Aries in the 11th house indicates this could begin as friendship but quickly evolve into something more passionate and direct.

She leans back, her silver bangles jingling softly

The true intended outcome? The chart suggests this connection is meant to be deeply transformative for both parties. It's not a simple romance - it's a catalyst for profound change. The Pluto conjunction to the Midheaven suggests this could significantly impact your life direction and public standing.

However, with Neptune's strong presence and its conjunction to the North Node, there's a warning that the full truth of this connection may not be immediately clear. There could be elements of fantasy or illusion that need to be worked through.

Her eyes lock with yours, unflinching

The chart suggests this connection has the potential for intense passion and transformation, but it also carries significant complications. The outcome depends greatly on how you both handle the powerful energies at play.

Would you like me to elaborate on any particular aspect of this reading?

The chart suggests this connection has the potential for intense passion and transformation, but it also carries significant complications. The outcome depends greatly on how you both handle the powerful energies at play.

Would you like me to elaborate on any particular aspect of this reading?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda's eyes narrow as she leans forward, her voice dropping to a whisper.

"Yes, my dear. The chart is quite clear about the intended outcome of your connection with Stefan. With Pluto in your 9th house of foreign connections, conjunct the Midheaven and in exact trine to your Ascendant, this connection is destined to lead to a passionate, sexual affair that will transform both of your lives."

She traces the aspects with her bejeweled finger.

"The multiple oppositions involving Venus, along with Neptune's influence, suggest this will likely begin as a secret liaison. However, with the Moon's position and aspects, emotions will run deep and true feelings will eventually surface, making discretion difficult to maintain."

Her dark eyes lock with yours meaningfully.

"The chart indicates this connection is fated to become physical and intensely sexual in nature. That is its true intended outcome - to awaken passionate desires in both of you that have long laid dormant."
